summary: Completed testing of mobile drag-and-drop functionality for SpeedShield PWA. Drag controls now appear correctly when tapping speedometer, but actual dragging still does not update position in localStorage. Toast notifications are properly positioned at bottom-left.

ui_bugs.issue: Drag operation does not update position in localStorage
ui_bugs.details: While drag controls appear correctly and drag handle is interactive, the actual drag operation from (195,422) to (275,462) does not update the speedHudPosition in localStorage. Position remains at {x: 0, y: 80} before and after drag.

ui_bugs.issue: Lock button click does not change visual state or localStorage
ui_bugs.details: Lock button is clickable but does not change CSS classes or update speedHudPosition_locked in localStorage. State remains 'false' after clicking.

integration_issues.issue: Drag event handlers may not be properly attached or functioning
integration_issues.details: Mouse events (mousedown, mousemove, mouseup) are executed but do not trigger position updates

passed_tests: Mobile drag controls - Tap on speedometer shows drag controls (lock/unlock button and 'DRAG' handle)
Mobile drag controls - Lock/unlock button is visible with proper green unlock icon
Mobile drag controls - Drag handle with 'DRAG' text is visible and properly positioned above speedometer
Mobile drag controls - Controls have proper opacity and positioning
localStorage persistence - speedHudPosition key exists with initial value {x: 0, y: 80}
localStorage persistence - speedHudPosition_locked key exists with value 'false'
Mobile viewport - App loads correctly on mobile viewport (390x844)
Mobile viewport - Speedometer component is properly positioned and visible
Toast notification position - Notifications positioned at bottom-left (VOICE and AUDIO indicators visible)
Touch target sizing - Drag handle appears to meet minimum touch target requirements
Visual feedback - Controls show proper styling with backdrop blur and proper colors
Onboarding bypass - Continue and Skip buttons work correctly

success_percentage.frontend: 60% (drag controls work, but actual dragging and lock functionality not working)
success_percentage.mobile_drag_drop: 60% (2 out of 5 core features working properly)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix drag event handling in DraggableHUD component. The drag controls appear correctly but the actual drag operation (mousedown/mousemove/mouseup sequence) does not update the position in localStorage. Also fix lock button functionality - clicking should toggle the locked state and update localStorage. Check if event handlers are properly attached to the drag handle element and if the position update logic is working correctly.
